description: This file defines a Pydantic data model for movie scripts, creates an agent for generating movie scripts using a Gemini model, and demonstrates usage by printing a response.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class used to generate and print a response based on input.
